oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Kind Of Needing I Need - Bill Anderson performance - 1971-02-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of The Kind Of Needing I Need, written by Bill Anderson, produced by Owen Bradley, recorded on February 25, 1971 at Bradley's Barn in Mount Juliet, Tenn., and performed by Bill Anderson (vocals), Jimmy Wilson (guitar), Jerry Shook (guitar), Steve Chapman (guitar), Sonny Garrish (steel), Roy Huskey Jr. (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), Jimmy Woodard (piano), and the Jordanaires (background vocals).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Anderson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Bill Anderson performs "The Kind Of Needing I Need"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: [Audie Ashworth letterhead] Song pitch letter addressed to Eddy Arnold [handwritten], "The Kind Of Needing I Need" lyric sheet [typed], and "Morning Goodbyes" lyric sheets [typed] stored with transcription documents, Box 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Anderson, Bill, 1937-; Bradley, Owen; Wilson, Jim (Musician); Shook, Jerry; Chapman, Steven Curtis; Garrish, Sonny; Huskey, Junior (Roy Madison); Harman, Buddy; Jordanaires (Musical group)
